function.name: microwave_start
function.description: This function is used to start the microwave with a specified duration.

location.description: The location where the microwave is located.

room.description: The room where the microwave is located.

device.description: The name of the microwave that needs to be started.

timer.description: The duration for which the microwave should cook.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the microwave that needs to be started.

temperature.description: The temperature at which the microwave should cook.

temperatureUnit.description: The unit of temperature for the SmartThings device.
